card.name: Odd-Eyes Saber Dragon
card.description: If this card is in your hand: You can Tribute 1 LIGHT monster; send 1 "Odd-Eyes Dragon" from your hand, Deck, or your side of the field to the Graveyard, and if you do, Special Summon this card. When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: You can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

card.name: Alexandrite Dragon
card.description: Many of the czars' lost jewels can be found in the scales of this priceless dragon. Its creator remains a mystery, along with how they acquired the imperial treasures. But whosoever finds this dragon has hit the jackpot... whether they know it or not.

card.name: Mystical Elf
card.description: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.

card.name: Odd-Eyes Dragon
card.description: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the original ATK of that monster in the Graveyard.

card.name: Kaiser Glider
card.description: Cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster that has the same ATK. If this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: Target 1 monster on the field; return that target to the hand.

card.name: Cyber Dragon
card.description: If only your opponent controls a monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

card.name: Herald of Creation
card.description: Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Level 7 or higher monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

card.name: Blade Knight
card.description: Gains 400 ATK while you have 1 or less cards in your hand. If you control no other monsters, the effects of Flip monsters destroyed by battle with this card are negated.

card.name: Mirage Dragon
card.description: Your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards during the Battle Phase.

card.name: Maha Vailo
card.description: This card gains 500 ATK for each Equip Card equipped to this card.

card.name: DUCKER Mobile Cannon
card.description: FLIP: Target 1 Level 4 monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

card.name: Skelengel
card.description: FLIP: Draw 1 card.

card.name: The Calculator
card.description: The ATK of this card is the combined Levels of all face-up monsters you control x 300.

card.name: Dark Hole
card.description: Destroy all monsters on the field.

card.name: Smashing Ground
card.description: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the highest DEF (your choice, if tied).

card.name: Monster Reincarnation
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster in your GY; add it to your hand.

card.name: Mystical Space Typhoon
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

card.name: Rush Recklessly
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 700 ATK until the end of this turn.

card.name: Poison of the Old Man
card.description: Activate 1 of these effects;●Gain 1200 LP.●Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Black Pendant
card.description: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Malevolent Nuzzler
card.description: The equipped monster gains 700 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can pay 500 LP; place this card on the top of your Deck.

card.name: Mirror Force
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

card.name: Magic Cylinder
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

card.name: Pinpoint Guard
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target 1 Level 4 or lower monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it in Defense Position. It cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn.

card.name: Trap Hole
card.description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

card.name: Dust Tornado
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand.

card.name: Call of the Haunted
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that target. When that target is destroyed, destroy this card.

card.name: Negate Attack
card.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, then end the Battle Phase.
